Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Sky City at Brickell Bay in Miami (Brickell), you'll be minutes from Miami Convention Center and close to Port of Miami. This family-friendly condo is within close proximity of Bayfront Park and Mary Brickell Village.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 4 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers and sofa beds, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a picnic area.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Sky City at Brickell Bay, or find a snack in a coffee shop/caf√©. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and laundry facilities.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Sky City at Brickell Bay, or find a snack in a coffee shop/caf√©. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Sky City at Brickell Bay in Miami (Brickell), you'll be minutes from Miami Convention Center and close to Port of Miami. This family-friendly condo is within close proximity of Bayfront Park and Mary Brickell Village.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Miami Convention Center - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Bayfront Park - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Mary Brickell Village - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Gusman Center for the Performing Arts - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Miami-Dade County Courthouse - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
HistoryMiami - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Wallflower Gallery - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Bayside Marketplace - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Island Queen Cruises - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Freedom Tower - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
American Airlines Arena - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Port of Miami - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Bicentennial Park - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Perez Art Museum Miami - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts of Miami-Dade County - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
Miami, FL (MIA-Miami Intl.) - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
Fort Lauderdale, FL (FLL-Fort Lauderdale - Hollywood Intl.) - 34 km / 21.1 mi

The preferred airport for Sky City at Brickell Bay is Fort Lauderdale, FL (FLL-Fort Lauderdale - Hollywood Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
